content: Not sure whether this is a known issue. You get a 'Not Found' error when you try to access the docs for ty_and_layout_field
Weird... You can see it on https://doc.rust-lang.org/nightly/nightly-rustc/rustc_middle/ty/type.Ty.html but that shouldn't happen... Can you open an issue on the rust repository please?
It's an issue with re-exports. The original, in the ty module, works: https://doc.rust-lang.org/nightly/nightly-rustc/rustc_middle/ty/type.Ty.html#method.ty_and_layout_field

Noah Lev said:

It's an issue with re-exports.

So is this a known issue, or should I open an issue on github?
It's probably already known, but just to be safe, can you open one?
